title: Breville Presents: Heritage Cookbook Recipe Husk Cheeseburger
description: Sean Brock talks about his absolute favorite thing to eat--and how to make it. The recipe is in his new cookbook, Heritage.

asset.author: breville
asset.hookText:
Sean Brock talks about his absolute favorite thing to eat--and how to make it. The recipe is in his new cookbook, Heritage.

To find out more about the book:
http://www.huskrestaurant.com/book/

For recipes from Heritage:
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRSnFecax3hHwsEXoc8j1AHBWv47td_Qp

More recipes from The Mind of a Chef featuring Sean:
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRSnFecax3hH21wZHftpLESdivGDdnD2z

For more videos and recipes from Breville:
http://foodthinkers.com
